snippet: In an unusual ruling, a judge found that egg and sperm had colluded to create a medical oddity: The man whom the woman claimed to be the father of her twins was deemed responsible for only one.
abstract: New Jersey State Superior Court Judge Sohail Mohammed rules on claim by mother of twins for public aid in Passaic County; based on DNA testing, judge finds that man who woman says is father of twins is deemed responsible for only one; rules other twin was conceived during undisclosed tryst.
lead_paragraph: In an unusual ruling, a judge found that egg and sperm had colluded to create a medical oddity: The man whom the woman claimed to be the father of her twins was deemed responsible for only one.

headline.main: Paternity Case for a New Jersey Mother of Twins Bears Unexpected Results: Two Fathers
headline.print_headline: Paternity Case for a New Jersey Mother of Twins Bears Unexpected Results: Two Fathers
